title: New, more realistic simulator will improve self-driving vehicle safety before road testing

title_detail.value: New, more realistic simulator will improve self-driving vehicle safety before road testing

summary: Scientists have developed data-driven simulation technology that combines photos, videos, real-world trajectory, and behavioral data into a scalable, realistic autonomous driving simulator.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have developed data-driven simulation technology that combines photos, videos, real-world trajectory, and behavioral data into a scalable, realistic autonomous driving simulator.
